update.foreach:
update TB_CGCLAUSEDATA
C_CREATER = #{item.cCreaterTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIMESTAMP = #{item.cTimestampTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_MODIFIER = #{item.cModifierTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

C_SW20 = #{item.cSw20TbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ID = #{item.cIdTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ITEMID = #{item.cItemidTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ITEMDES = #{item.cItemdesTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_FAITEMID = #{item.cFaitemidTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

C_VALUE = #{item.cValueTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_DR = #{item.cDrTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CREATETIME = #{item.cCreatetimeTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
WHERE 1 = 1 and C_ID = #{item.cIdTbCgclausedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
